create_table_user: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS USER (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, USERNAME STRING UNIQUE NOT NULL, DISPLAY_NAME STRING NOT NULL, GRAD_YEAR NUMBER NOT NULL, GRAD_SEMESTER STRING NOT NULL, MAJOR STRING NOT NULL, MINOR STRING DEFAULT '');
create_table_session: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SESSION (TOKEN STRING UNIQUE NOT NULL, USER_ID INTEGER REFERENCES USER (ID) UNIQUE NOT NULL, EXPIRES_AT DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
create_table_course: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS COURSE (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, CODE STRING NOT NULL UNIQUE, NAME STRING, SUBJECT STRING NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION STRING NOT NULL);
create_table_uni_class: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS UNI_CLASS (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, COURSE_ID INTEGER REFERENCES COURSE (ID), YEAR INTEGER NOT NULL, SEMESTER STRING NOT NULL, PROF STRING, UNIQUE (COURSE_ID, YEAR, SEMESTER));
create_table_aggr_rating: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS AGGR_RATING (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, UNI_CLASS_ID INTEGER REFERENCES UNI_CLASS (ID), COURSE_ID INTEGER REFERENCES COURSE (ID), RATE_USER_AVG REAL DEFAULT -1.0, RATE_RMP_HELPFULNESS REAL DEFAULT -1.0, RATE_RMP_DIFFICULTY REAL DEFAULT -1.0);
create_table_user_rating: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RATING_USER (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, USER_ID INTEGER REFERENCES USER (ID), UNI_CLASS_ID INTEGER REFERENCES UNI_CLASS (ID), RATING INTEGER DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, REVIEW STRING DEFAULT '', CREATED_AT DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UPDATED_AT DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
create_table_friendship: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS FRIENDSHIP (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, USER_1_ID INTEGER REFERENCES USER (ID), USER_2_ID INTEGER REFERENCES USER (ID) CHECK (USER_1_ID < USER_2_ID), CREATED_AT DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UNIQUE(USER_1_ID, USER_2_ID));
create_table_friend_request: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS FRIEND_REQUEST (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, SENDER_ID INTEGER REFERENCES USER (ID), RECEIVER_ID INTEGER REFERENCES USER (ID), CREATED_AT DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UNIQUE (SENDER_ID, RECEIVER_ID));
